name: UControlRigComponent
doc: A component that hosts an animation ControlRig, manages control components and marshals data between the two

OnPreInitializeDelegate: Event fired just before this component's ControlRig is initialized
OnPostInitializeDelegate: Event fired after this component's ControlRig is initialized
OnPreConstructionDelegate: Event fired before this component's ControlRig is setup
OnPostConstructionDelegate: Event fired after this component's ControlRig is setup
OnPreForwardsSolveDelegate: Event fired before this component's ControlRig's forwards solve
OnPostForwardsSolveDelegate: Event fired after this component's ControlRig's forwards solve
bEnableLazyEvaluation: When checked the rig will only run if any of the mapped inputs has changed
LazyEvaluationPositionThreshold: The delta threshold for a translation / position difference. 0.0 disables position differences.
LazyEvaluationRotationThreshold: The delta threshold for a rotation difference (in degrees). 0.0 disables rotation differences.
LazyEvaluationScaleThreshold: The delta threshold for a scale difference. 0.0 disables scale differences.
bResetTransformBeforeTick: When checked the transforms are reset before a tick / update of the rig
bResetInitialsBeforeConstruction: When checked the initial transforms on bones, nulls and controls are reset prior to a construction event
bUpdateRigOnTick: When checked this ensures to run the rig's update on the component's tick automatically
bUpdateInEditor: When checked the rig is run in the editor viewport without running / simulation the game
bDrawBones: When checked the rig's bones are drawn using debug drawing similar to the animation editor viewport
bShowDebugDrawing: When checked the rig's debug drawing instructions are drawn in the viewport
ControlRigClass: The class of control rig to instantiate

methods.name: AddMappedCompleteSkeletalMesh
methods.doc: Adds all matching bones to the rig, should not be used before OnPreInitialize Event

methods.name: AddMappedComponents
methods.doc: Adds a series of mapped bones to the rig, should not be used before OnPreInitialize Event

methods.name: AddMappedElements
methods.doc: Adds the provided mapped elements to the component, should not be used before OnPreInitialize Event

methods.name: AddMappedSkeletalMesh
methods.doc: Adds a series of mapped bones to the rig, should not be used before OnPreInitialize Event

methods.name: CanExecute
methods.doc: Returns true if the Component can execute its Control Rig

methods.name: ClearMappedElements
methods.doc: Removes all mapped elements from the component

methods.name: DoesElementExist
GetAbsoluteTime
methods.doc: Get the ControlRig's local time in seconds since its last initialize

methods.name: GetBoneTransform
GetControlBool
GetControlFloat
GetControlInt
GetControlOffset
GetControlPosition
GetControlRig
methods.doc: Get the ControlRig hosted by this component

methods.name: GetControlRotator
GetControlScale
GetControlTransform
GetControlVector2D
GetElementNames
GetInitialBoneTransform
GetInitialSpaceTransform
GetSpaceTransform
Initialize
methods.doc: Initializes the rig's memory and calls the construction event

methods.name: SetBoneInitialTransformsFromSkeletalMesh
methods.doc: Setup the initial transforms / ref pose of the bones based on a skeletal mesh

methods.name: SetBoneTransform
SetControlBool
SetControlFloat
SetControlInt
SetControlOffset
SetControlPosition
SetControlRotator
SetControlScale
SetControlTransform
SetControlVector2D
SetInitialBoneTransform
SetInitialSpaceTransform
SetMappedElements
methods.doc: Replaces the mapped elements on the component with the provided array, should not be used before OnPreInitialize Event

methods.name: Update
methods.doc: Updates and ticks the rig.
